name: réseau des collectivites territoriales pour une économie solidaire
goal:
gather french local authorities at any level which are conducting a public and local policy in the field of social economy.
gives elected people and services tools and méthods to implement their policy
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Member of the european committee of the french national COUNCIL of social and solidarity économy.

Collaboration with networks REVES and Eurocities
